articles.title: European Union Caps Russian Oil At $60 Per Barrel - NDTV
articles.description: The European Union will join the G7 powers in imposing a $60-per-barrel price cap on Russian oil, the Polish ambassador to the bloc said Friday, three days ahead of an EU embargo on imports by sea.
articles.content:
The oil price cap will run alongside the EU's ban on imports of Russian oil.
